articles.author: KELVIN CHAN, RAF CASERT
articles.title: EU's top court dismisses Apple's final appeal against order to pay Ireland 13B euros in back taxes - The Associated Press
articles.description: The European Union’s top court has rejected Apple’s final legal challenge against an order from the bloc’s executive commission to repay 13 billion euros ($14.34 billion) in back taxes to Ireland, bringing an end to the long-running dispute. The European Cour…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) Apple on Tuesday lost its last bid to avoid paying 13 billion euros ($14.34 billion) in back taxes to Ireland, in a finale to a dispute with the European Union that centered on sweethea… [+4656 chars]
